channel.title: Games on LGM
channel.description: Recent content in Games on LGM

item.title: Steam Proton (Linux)
item.description: WINED3D instead of Vulcan (If no Vulcan support) Library > Right click game > Properties SET LAUNCH OPTIONS PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 %command% Vulcan On (should be default in 2022?) Library > Right click game > Properties SET LAUNCH OPTIONS +r_renderapi 1 Debug Log per game SET LAUNCH OPTIONS DEBUGGER=gdb steam Library > Right click game > Properties SET LAUNCH OPTIONS -con_logfile Protontricks https://flathub.org/apps/details/com.github.Matoking.protontricks bashrc ++ alias protontricks='flatpak run com.github.Matoking.protontricks' bashsrc protontricks -s "Name Of Super Awesome Game" protontricks GAMEIDNUMBER --gui
